entries.title: Right-to-Repair Advocates Question John Deere’s New Promises
entries.description: The tractor maker is accused of blocking farmers from fixing their own equipment. A new agreement offers concessions—but campaigners say it’s not enough.

entries.title: Iran Says Face Recognition Will ID Women Breaking Hijab Laws
entries.description: Iranian women are baring their heads to protest government controls. A top official said algorithms can identify anyone flouting dress codes.

entries.title: The US Far Right Helped Stoke the Attack on Brazil’s Congress
entries.description: Right-wing networks from Brazil and the US fueled calls for violence. Experts accuse tech platforms of looking the other way.
